system.description:
Your mundane life comes with a series of obligations. Choose a total of three obligations.

  • Jobs: Barista, intern, host/ess, salesperson, delivery person, fast-food worker, babysitter, dishwasher, tech support, waitress/er
  • School: Schoolwork, athletic team, chess club, photography club, student government
  • Home: Caring for someone, household chores, paying bills, surrogate parenting
  • Social: Significant other, best friend, popularity, close relative, coach/teacher

When time passes, roll + your Mundane to see how youâ€™re managing your obligations.

failure.label: Complications...
failure.value: You haven’t given your normal life anywhere near the attention it deserves; the GM chooses two obligations that are going to bite you in the butt.

partial.label: Partial success
partial.value: Things are going pretty well—you have an opportunity or advantage thanks to one of your obligations. But you’ve lapsed on one obligation, your choice.

success.label: Success!
success.value: Things are going pretty well—you have an opportunity or advantage thanks to one of your obligations.
